Text:
I'n not the creator of this soft. So I'm not responsible for what happens to your pc.

If fails to work, see alternate instructions www.hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=95839

The tutorial at the alternative location (www.hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=95839) is very good. The links to obtain required software don't work anymore but I managed to find each required thing somewhere. I don't want to know how many viruses I put on my computer while doing that !!!  The Core Impact version 7.5 is older, but hey, a working version of a $40,000 software is freeking brilliant!! I can study this and add it to my resume. Yes! I have used Core Impact. Ha Ha!
The licensing.exe does include a worm.  my virus scan picked it up before the rest was finished downloading so cant comment on the actual program.
